overview: Christina is the organizer of contemporary art exhibitions, but in fact she organizes entertainment for rich clients in the most exotic places. Dozens of elite girls from all over the world work for it. Once in the past, Christina also worked as a hostess at such parties, but, being very ambitious, a few years ago she completely changed her image and became a top-class manager. But this work also has a downside - the constant presence of crime, police and special services, as well as the breakdowns and intrigues of girls trying to tear off a bigger piece of pie.
title: The Escort
